mapper.select: select * from ba_baza where orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and create_time between to_date(#{map.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{map.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
select * from ba_baf1 where orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and create_time between to_date(#{map.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{map.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
select * from ba_baf4 where orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and create_time between to_date(#{map.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{map.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
select * from ba_baf6 where orgcode = #{map.orgCode} and create_time between to_date(#{map.startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{map.endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss')
